author: RDIL
body:
`install-ps.yml` is run, but shouldn't be.
Maybe we should move to `/.vsts-ci/templates`?

For example:
https://powershell.visualstudio.com/PowerShell/_build/results?buildId=25996

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @RDIL @TravisEz13 Is the issue actual and should be fixed or we can close?

comments.author: RDIL
comments.body: It looks like this pipeline's logs got deleted, but I haven't contributed here recently so I am not sure.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Builds are only retained for a short time.  There is no way to tell now.  I've never seen this happen.

title: CI runs code that shouldn't be run
